text: O vy shcho vvazhayete, yakshcho vy vrazhayete v im'ya BOHA, vy budete absolyutno vpevneni. Ne skazhit聞 odnomu khto proponuye vam myr, "Vy vmiyete ne viruyuchyy, shukayuchyy psuyet聞sya ts聞oho svitu. Dlya BOHA volodiye neobmezhenym psuyet聞sya. Zapam'yatayte shcho vy zvychayno vyhlyadaly yak yikh, ta BOH blahoslovlyaye vas. Tomu, vy budete absolyutno vpevneni (pered tym, yak vy vrazhayete). BOH tsilkom Cognizant vse vy
